God Is The Light

Other Books

This is a book of poetry. It tells us about the uniqueness of God the Father. The Master designer of the universe. It glorifies God as a unique Masterpiece. Nothing can be compared with the creator. The Master Designer, The Invisible Wind, The most honorable and powerful one. It also talks about those who diligently serve him. He promised not to let them down and in His kingdom He calls us. The Author also talks about the divine interventions in our lives. Everything happens for a reason. The poet also acknowledges the mystery of the creation. The Sun, Moon, Rivers and Oceans, the Vegetations: All these are mystical Wonders that the Lord has made. Finally, to all who truly believe and serve Him, there lies the Crown of Life.

About The Author

Collette is an inspirational writer who has written and composed more than 100 songs. She is also a Spiritual Poetry writer and has composed many inspirational prayers. Most of her writings is about the uniqueness of the Creator, His Greatness that cannot be compared with anything, Living or Dead. The author encourages all human beings to serve the Lord no matter what situation they find themselves. God is the Author of Life. The Giver and the Taker. All Glory and Honor goes to Him. He is also the rewarder of those who diligently serve him. The Most Wonderful, The Most Powerful and the Greatest One.

The Author also acknowledges the Mystery of his Creation. The Sun, Moon, Rivers, and the Oceans. All these are Mystical Wonders which the Lord has made. Finally, to all who are faithful until the end, there lies the Crown of Life.
